data.title: How to Use Nelder-Mead Optimization in Python
data.description: The Nelder-Mead optimization algorithm is a widely used approach for non-differentiable objective functions. As such, it is generally referred to as a pattern search algorithm and is used as a local or global search procedure, challenging nonlinear and potentially noisy and multimodal function optimization problems. In this tutorial, you will discover the Nelder-Mead optimization algorithm. […]

data.title: Scaling Kubernetes to 7,500 Nodes
data.description:
We've scaled Kubernetes clusters to 7,500 nodes, producing a scalable
infrastructure for large models like GPT-3 [https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.14165], 
CLIP [https://openai.com/blog/clip/], and DALL·E
[https://openai.com/blog/dall-e/], but also for rapid small-scale iterative
research such as Scaling Laws for Neural

data.title: Computer Vision Use Cases in Healthcare and Medicine
data.description: Computer vision technology continues to expand its use cases in healthcare and medicine. In this post, we will touch on some exciting example use cases for vision in healthcare and medicine and provide some resources on getting started applying vision to these problems.
